scripts.clean: rm -fr node_modules ios/Pods ios/build macos/Pods macos/build android/app/build
scripts.build:android: mkdirp dist/res && react-native bundle --entry-file index.android.js --platform android --dev true --bundle-output dist/main.android.jsbundle --assets-dest dist/res
scripts.build:ios: mkdirp dist && react-native bundle --entry-file index.ios.js --platform ios --dev true --bundle-output dist/main.ios.jsbundle --assets-dest dist
scripts.build:macos: mkdirp dist && react-native bundle --entry-file index.ios.js --platform macos --dev true --bundle-output dist/main.macos.jsbundle --assets-dest dist
